resources.string:
"My daughter, Jane, never
dreamed of receiving a letter
from a girl of her own age in
Holland. Last year, we were
traveling across the Channel
and Jane put a piece of paper
with her name and address on
it into a bottle. She threw the
bottle into the sea. She never
thought of it again, but ten
month later, she received a
letter from a girl in Holland.
Both girls write to each other
regularly now. However, they
have decided to use the post
office. Letters will cost a little
more, but they will certainly
travel faster."
